version_description: MobilDeniz has been renewed for you!

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
We listen to you to be more user-friendly.
 
With this update;
-FX and Gold/Silver screens changed for a better customer experience,
-Accounts and Cards options added to Quick Menu,
-Performance improvements were made throughout the Application.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
We listen to you to be more user-friendly.
 
With this update;
-You can share your IBAN shown on Home page,
-E-mail your account activities.
-We improved the performance and user experience as always.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
We listen to you to be more user-friendly.
 
With this update;
-You may transfer your pension to our bank on an instant through the Applications menu,
-If you wish, you can make sure that your IBAN information is not available on the receipt when you transfer money.
-You may continue enjoying our application after some arrangements were made on pattern lock screen.
 
In addition, we improved the performance and user experience as always.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!

With this update;
-When you receive transfer via Mobile Number, you can check the balance of your transaction from your account with the highest balance,
-You can change the expired Pattern Lock more easily,
-You can control the sound of notification and end-of-transaction via the Notifications menu.

Corporate;
-You can apply for an SME card,
-You can take out a loan within the SME Card limits.

In addition, we improved the performance and user experience as always.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
We listen to you to be more user-friendly.
 
With this update;
-You can create user accounts with any of your DenizBank cards,
-You can reach Report Lost/Stolen screen from the Profile & Settings menu,
-You can complete your Missing Orders,
-You can switch between Personal/Corporate users on the Login screen,
-In addition, we improved the performance and user experience as always.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
We listen to you to be more user-friendly.
 
With this update;
-You can enjoy the app with colored menu icons,
-View the number of missing orders on the “Complete Missing Orders” menu,
-Top-up your ‘istanbulkart’ on the menu “Transportation Card Top-Up”,
-View your USD and EUR funds on “Mutual Fund” menu,
-Monitor your market data on the simplified “Markets” menu and buy/sell FX.
 
Corporate;
-You can view your SME Card and Bonus Business card,
-Access your statements,
-Pay your debts.
 
In addition, we improved the performance and user experience as always.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
We listen to you to be more user-friendly.

With this update;
-You can enjoy the app with colored menu icons,
-View the number of missing orders on the “Complete Missing Orders” menu,
-Top-up your ‘istanbulkart’ on the menu “Transportation Card Top-Up”,
-View your USD and EUR funds on “Mutual Fund” menu,
-Monitor your market data on the simplified “Markets” menu and buy/sell FX.

Corporate;
-You can view your SME Card and Bonus Business card,
-Access your statements,
-Pay your debts.

In addition, we improved the performance and user experience as always.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
With this update;
-Make loan calculation through pre-login "Calculation" menu,
-Enjoy all new "Deniz Store" menu.
 
Corporate;
-You can view and approve your files regarding bulk payments,
-View and approve your files regarding your salary payments,
-Impose transaction restriction for your SME Card. 
 
In addition, we improved the performance and user experience.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
 
With this update;
-You may realize your transactions through the upgraded "Sub-Menu" and "Quick-Menu".
 
Corporate;
-You can easily enter your "Corporate" account with the revision made on the login screen,
-You can view your daily, periodic and account statement information and make detailed transaction inquiry on "Merchant Transactions" menu.
 
We increased our accessibility standards.
Also, we improved performance and user experience as always.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
We listen to you to be more user-friendly.
 
With this update;
-You may transfer your pension to our bank on an instant through the Applications menu,
-If you wish, you can make sure that your IBAN information is not available on the receipt when you transfer money.
-You may continue enjoying our application after some arrangements were made on pattern lock screen.
 
In addition, we improved the performance and user experience as always.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!

With this update;
-When you receive transfer via Mobile Number, you can check the balance of your transaction from your account with the highest balance,
-You can change the expired Pattern Lock more easily,
-You can control the sound of notification and end-of-transaction via the Notifications menu.

Corporate;
-You can apply for an SME card,
-You can take out a loan within the SME Card limits.

In addition, we improved the performance and user experience as always.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
 
With this update;
-You can view Producer Card details/statement and pay your card debt,
-Hide the account/card balance, limit and activities on Home page,
-Make arbitrage transaction,
-View SWIFT messages,
-View clearing cheques,
-View POS Accounts and release the blockages,
-View the commercial campaigns in Corporate Login tab.
 
In addition, we improved the performance and user experience as always.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
With this update;
-You can view Producer Card details/statement and pay your card debt,
-Hide the account/card balance, limit and activities on Home page,
-Make arbitrage transaction,
-View SWIFT messages,
-View clearing cheques,
-View POS Accounts and release the blockages,
-View the commercial campaigns in Corporate Login tab.

*Bug fixes.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
 
With this update;
-Performance and user experience improvements have been made.
 
We keep on improving the application in line with the feedback received from you.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
 
With this update;
-Your current Pattern Lock can be used easily on another devices,
-Performance and user experience improvements have been made.
 
We keep on improving the application in line with the feedback received from you.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
 
With this update;
-You can withdraw cash from DenizBank ATM via QR code,
-Secure your card debt with Credit Card Shield product,
-Change your current password anytime through Password Settings menu,
 
We keep on improving the application in line with the feedback received from you.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!
 
With this update;
-Search and filtering features were added to Saved and Last 50 Money Transfers menus,
-Search feature was added to Saved and Last 50 Bills menus,
-Saved Bills and Last 50 Bills buttons were added to New Bill Payment menus,
-Easy Access to Account Activities through the Account Detail menu was ensured,
-New background visuals were added.
 
We keep on improving the application in line with the feedback received from you.
MobilDeniz continues to be renewed!

We continue to upgrade MobilDeniz!
 
With this update, you can;
-make your HGS/OGS Application and realize HGS Activity Monitoring and Order Updating processes
-pay for your Fine and International Departure Fee
-create your Telephone Banking password
-email your POS statement
-continue topping up your istanbulkart.
 
We also renewed the font for a better experience.
 
We continue to develop our application in line with your feedbacks.

MobilDeniz has been upgraded!

With this upgrade, you can:

- copy your Virtual Card number,
- view the order history for your utility bills on Order transactions screen or pay your debts with a single click,
- We are sorry to inform you that our customers who own phones with an iPhone 4S, iPhone 5 and iOS 9 OS cannot benefit from our updates of 2.13.0 and above.

Also, performance and user experience improvements have been made.

We continue to develop MobilDeniz in line with our feedback.

MobilDeniz renewals continue!
After this update, you can
·         Transfer money via Siri,
·         Make Producer Card Instalment Loan (ÜRETAKS) utilization and Repayment transactions,
·         Pay Other Banks Credit Card debts under the Payments menu,
·         Quickly log in to the application using the numeric keyboard.
For your security, you can log in to MobilDeniz only with the device where your sim card is inserted.
Furthermore, some performance and user experience improvements have been introduced.

MobilDeniz renewals continue!
 
With this update;
 
-          You may cancel the transactions you have realized on transaction cancellations screen and finish your debt by making early payment for your installments and installment cash advance.
-          You may view all summary statements within one year on summary statement screen.
 
In addition, performance and user experience improvements have been carried out.
 
We keep on improving the application in line with the feedback we receive from you.

MobilDeniz continues its upgrades!

With this update, you can;

- Access your Euro statement for your credit card.
- Cancel your loan disbursement on the Transaction Cancellations screen and apply for the right of withdrawal.
- You will also be informed with an SMS when you change your password or log into the application from a different device and with a push notification when you withdraw money using QR feature.
 
Also, we improved performance and user experience as always.

MobilDeniz continues its upgrades!
 
With this update, you can:
 
-          Carry out cash transfer by scanning the QR code of the receiving account and share your account’s QR code.
-          With the “Request Cash” feature, you can request cash by entering the mobile phone number of the person you ask and the amount you ask from them. 
-          Enjoy buy-sell transactions of non-DenizPortfolio funds. 
 
Performance and user experience have been improved as well.

MobilDeniz is updated!
 
With this update:
-          You can set your telephone number, e-mail address, Republic of Turkey ID Number/ Tax ID Number/ Foreigner ID Number or passport number as Easy Address to your accounts,

-          Request cash with Siri,

-          Create a security question and securely carry out transactions requiring verification,

-          Add Extra Instalments to your expenditures that are already in an installment plan,

-          Update your Professional and Education Information.

Furthermore, performance and user experience have been improved.

MobilDeniz is updated!
 
With this update;
 
-It is so much easier to sign in to Internet Banking! With the Internet Branch Login feature available on the Quick Menu, you can scan the QR code in Internet Banking and sign in.
-You can enjoy our new autumnal background image.
 

Also, performance and user experience have been improved.

MobilDeniz is updated!

With this update;

-Get informed about the exclusive campaigns on the updated Campaigns menu, track the campaigns you have joined and which have ended,
-Deposit money in our ATMs with QR code,
-Approve your agreements pending approval,
-View the forms, agreements you have approved and emails coming from Denizbank,
-Set the password of your SME card,
-Update your income information,
-Hide your expense information in your emails by selecting “Sensitive Data” that has been added to the email menu,
-Track your approved loan application on the notifications screen and get directed to the Utilize Approved Loan screen. 

Furthermore, performance and user experience have been improved.

MobilDeniz has been upgraded!
 
With this update;
 
-Get informed about the exclusive campaigns on the updated Campaigns menu, track the campaigns you have joined and which have ended,
-Deposit money in our ATMs with QR code,
-Approve your agreements pending approval,
-View the forms, agreements you have approved and emails coming from Denizbank,
-Set the password of your SME card,
-Update your income information,
-Hide your expense information in your emails by selecting “Sensitive Data” that has been added to the email menu,
-Track your approved loan application on the notifications screen and get directed to the Utilize Approved Loan screen.
 
Furthermore, performance and user experience have been improved.

MobilDeniz has been updated again!

With this update;

- You can find answers to your questions and find the transactions you are looking for quickly with the Virtual Assistant Deniz,
- You can apply for a Rescue Account for your cash needs, update your limit and split your transactions into installments,
- As soon as your credit card application is approved, you can start shopping with your Instant Virtual Card without waiting for your physical credit card to arrive,
- You can use cash advance with your Virtual Cards and perform transactions safely by updating the CVV code of your card,
- 24/7 instant money transfer is available at MobilDeniz! With the FAST system, you can now send and receive money to and from all bank accounts whenever you want,
- With Secure Device pairing, you can log into Internet Banking by confirming the notifications we send to your paired devices, and securely perform transactions requiring verification through different channels.

In addition, performance and user experience have also been improved.

MobilDeniz has been updated again!
 
With this update;
 
- You can find answers to your questions and find the transactions you are looking for quickly with the Virtual Assistant Deniz,
- You can apply for a Rescue Account for your cash needs, update your limit and split your transactions into installments,
- You can use cash advance with your Virtual Cards and perform transactions safely by updating the CVV code of your card,
- As soon as your credit card application is approved, you can start shopping with your Instant Virtual Card without waiting for your physical credit card to arrive,
- With Secure Device pairing, you can log into Internet Banking by confirming the notifications we send to your paired devices, and securely perform transactions requiring verification through different channels,
- 24/7 instant money transfer is available at MobilDeniz! With the FAST system, you can now send and receive money to and from all bank accounts whenever you want.

MobilDeniz has been updated again!

With this update;

- You can find answers to your questions and find the transactions you are looking for quickly with the Virtual Assistant Deniz,

- You can apply for a Rescue Account for your cash needs, update your limit and split your transactions into installments,

- As soon as your credit card application is approved, you can start shopping with your Instant Virtual Card without waiting for your physical credit card to arrive,

- You can use cash advance with your Virtual Cards and perform transactions safely by updating the CVV code of your card,

- 24/7 instant money transfer is available at MobilDeniz! With the FAST system, you can now send and receive money to and from all bank accounts whenever you want,

In addition, performance and user experience have also been improved.

MobilDeniz has been updated again!

You will soon be able to become our customer on MobilDeniz without going to the branch and realize your banking transactions quickly and easily!

With this update, you can;

-You can earn bonus with your regular spending promise as part of the Win a Prize with your Word campaigns and track the status of your campaigns. 
-View the background image with special Spring theme.

In addition, accessibility features, performance and user experience have been improved.

MobileDeniz continues to be renovated!

From now on, you can become a DenizBank customer whenever you wish and enjoy our favorable products tailored for you!

Also, through this update,

- You may withdraw money from other bank ATMs with QR code,
- Through the NFC feature of your device, you may renew your password and become a customer through your ID Card,
- Open an investment account,
- Use Producer Card Cash Advance,
- View the contact information of your branch from the Reach Us Screens,
- Receive Investment Advisory services after completing the Financial Suitability Test,
- Video chat with our Call Center,
- View your e-mails from the Notifications and E-mail screen.

The updates aim to improve performance and user experience.

MobilDeniz has been updated again!

With this update;

-Sole proprietors will be able to create user and update their password through Corporate Log In,
-You will be able to receive answers from our Virtual Assistant Deniz based on your location and to ask Deniz to perform any transaction, 
-You will be able to Withdraw and Deposit Money with QR quickly on the same screen,
-While transferring money, you will be able to scan your IBAN information with your camera or to perform your transaction with the picture containing the IBAN information in your gallery,
-You will be able to scan your subscription number with your camera in your bill payments,
-You will be able to finalize your credit card application quickly with our renewed application screen, 
-You will be able to pay your passport fee and registration fee for telephones purchased from abroad,
-You will be able to define your notification settings and account statement delivery preferences in detail,
-You will be able to define your limit update preference while updating your virtual card limit, 
-You will be able to use your SME Card or Bonus Business Card for your bill payments, SSI payments and other payments, 
-You will be able to pay your Motor Vehicles Tax with your Producer Card,
-You will be able to approve your credit card limit increase requests submitted to the Branch.


Performance and user experience improvements have also been made.

MobilDeniz has been updated again!

With this update;

-Sole proprietors will be able to create user and update their password through Corporate Log In,
-You will be able to receive answers from our Virtual Assistant Deniz based on your location and to ask Deniz to perform any transaction, 
-You will be able to Withdraw and Deposit Money with QR quickly on the same screen,
-While transferring money, you will be able to scan your IBAN information with your camera or to perform your transaction with the picture containing the IBAN information in your gallery,
-You will be able to scan your subscription number with your camera in your bill payments,
-You will be able to finalize your credit card application quickly with our renewed application screen, 
-You will be able to pay your passport fee and registration fee for telephones purchased from abroad,
-You will be able to define your notification settings and account statement delivery preferences in detail,
-You will be able to define your limit update preference while updating your virtual card limit, 
-You will be able to use your SME Card or Bonus Business Card for your bill payments, SSI payments and other payments, 
-You will be able to pay your Motor Vehicles Tax with your Producer Card,
-You will be able to approve your credit card limit increase requests submitted to the Branch.
-Performance and user experience improvements have also been made.

MobilDeniz has been updated again!

With this update, you will be able to:

-Send voice messages while using the Virtual Assistant Deniz,
-You may send money to other bank accounts through a QR code,
-View your delayed payments on the Financial Summary screen,
-Manage the contactless feature of your card under the credit card transaction authorizations menu,
-Apply for pension promotions and track your application,
-You may select quarter, half or full gold coins for your gold buy/sell transactions,
-View the parity of all currencies on a single screen under the Foreign Currency and Gold/Silver menu,
-You may follow your SWIFT transaction status step by step.
-Performance and user experience improvements have also been made.

MobilDeniz has been updated again!

With this update, you will be able to;
- Monitor your debit card and update its password,
- Pay with QR in the merchants and get a refund,
- Apply for BES and follow up your application,
- Apply for and follow up Overdraft Life Insurance,
- Pay your bills with Producer Card and create an order,
- Monitor your ELÜS transaction activities with detailed filtering,
- Transfer from your Gold and Silver account,
- You can view your automatic payments on the Last 50 bill screen.

Furthermore, performance and user experience has been improved.

MobilDeniz continues to upgrade with the feedback we receive from you!

With this update, you can;

-Use your approved limit exclusive to you on the upgraded loan application screens, may continue your applications from where you last left them off, select one of the loan options that are most appropriate to you, and use your loan without insurance,
-Set your delivery address in the events of card loss/theft,
-Set your credit card and debit card passwords before logging into the application,
-Make a video call with our customers with hearing impairment,
-Set your authorization and sector-based limits for Bonus business cards,
-Realize your OGS monitoring and order update,
-Define and update your Captain account.

In addition, performance and user experience have been improved.

MobilDeniz continues to be renewed! 



- You can open TL Time Deposit Accounts with Foreign Currency Protection or TL Conversion. 
- You can apply for Healthy Life and Personal Accident insurance through Mobildeniz. 
- You can become a remote customer through video chat enabling sign language. 
- You can apply and follow up on stock IPOs. 



Besides all of these new features; we offer solutions that improve performance and user experience.

MobilDeniz has been updated again!

With this update, you will be able to:

-Open a TL Time Deposit Account with Protection against Foreign Exchange,
-Become our customer through a video call in sign language,
-Apply for public offerings for stocks and follow up on your application,
-Apply for the Bonus Business card,
-Automatically split your eligible expenditures into installments upon your order for Automatic Cash Installment,
-Apply for primary and virtual debit cards, change account information,
-Change the funds, make contribution payments or additional contribution payments and change your payment preferences in your private pension scheme,
-Set the monthly turnover limit of your merchant on a customer basis.
                                
Also, performance and user experience improvements have been made.
